03Window: ^<color=#ffffffff>The streets and the night sky of Japan lay before you.
^There is such a big world for you to explore, yet there is only one place you want to be.
^The best Bread, the perfect crunch, the finest baked goods and desserts.
^The city of love? No, the city of a Bakers Dream.
^And one day, you will have your dream bakery in the centre of it all.
